main event: A bright, maneuverable UFO was observed near Vista, California in February 1963.
interesting points: The UFO appeared solid and very bright, reflecting light greatly.
The shape of the UFO changed and it made a humming sound.
The UFO rapidly changed direction and appeared to hover at times.
The UFO was visible for about 5-10 minutes before disappearing below the horizon.
The UFO was observed moving behind a cluster of trees at one point.
witnesses: a young boy and his mother
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
